name: Ikari III - The Rescue [PSPM]
description: Ikari III: The Rescue (also known as Ikari Warriors III: The Rescue), known simply as Ikari III (怒Ⅲ) in Japan, is an arcade beat 'em up. It was ported to the NES, DOS, and C64. It is the third and final installment of the Ikari Warriors series after Ikari Warriors, and Victory Road.
